bahasa! Mana prabhuvu manaku diniki baduluga dini kante sresthamaina danini prasadinca vaccu! Niscayanga, manam mana prabhuvu vaipunaku (pascattapanto) maraludamu
i vidhanga untundi siksa! Mariyu paraloka siksa dini kante ghoranga untundi. Varu idi telusukunte enta bagundedi
niscayanga, daivabhiti galavariki vari prabhuvu vadda paramanandakaramaina svargavanalu untayi
emi? Memu vidheyulanu (muslinlanu) nerasthulato samananga encuduma
mikemayindi? Miru e vidhamaina nirnayalu cestunnaru
mi vadda edayina (divya) granthamunda? Dani nundi miru nercukovataniki
niscayanga, andulo miku, miru koredanta undani
leka, punarut'thana dinam varaku, miru nirnayincukunnade miku tappaka labhistundani, memu mito cesina gatti pramanam edaina unda
varilo diniki evadu hamiga unnado adugu
Leka, variki evaraina (varu allah ku kalpincina) bhagasvamulu unnara? Okavela varu satyavantule ayite tama a bhagasvamulanu tisuku ram'manu
(jnapakamuncukondi) e rojayite pikka emuka terici veyabadutundo! Mariyu varu sastangam (sajda) ceyataniki piluvabadataro, appudu varu (kapata visvasulu), ala (sajda) ceyaleru
vari cupulu krindiki valipoyi untayi, avamanam varini avarinci untundi. Mariyu vastavaniki varu niksepanga unnappudu sastangam (sajda) ceyataniki ahvanincabadite (tiraskarincevaru)
kavuna nannu mariyu i sandesanni abad'dhamani tiraskarince varini vadalandi. Varu grahincani vidhanga memu varini kramakramanga (vinasam vaipunaku) tisukoni potamu
mariyu nenu variki konta vyavadhi nistunnanu. Niscayanga, na pannagam cala drdhamainadi
leka, (o pravakta!) Nivu varini edaina pratiphalam ivvamani adugutunnava? Variki dani runam bharamavataniki
leka, vari vadda edaina agocara jnanam unda? Varu danini vrasi pettadaniki
kavuna nivu ni prabhuvu ajna koraku veci undu. Mariyu nivu, cepavani (yunus) vale vyavaharincaku. (Gurtuku teccuko) atanu duhkhanlo unnappudu (tana prabhuvunu) mora pettukunnadu

atani prabhuvu anugrahame ganaka ataniki andaka poyi unte, atanu avamanakaramaina sthitilo (cepa kadupulo padi undevadu kani memu atanini ksamincamu). Kavuna atanu cauta (banjaru) maidananlo visari veya baddadu
civaraku atani prabhuvu atanini ennukoni satpurusulalo cercadu

Mariyu a satyatiraskarulu, i sandesanni (khur'an nu) vinnappudu, tama cupulato ni kallu udagodatara annatlu (ninnu jarinci padavesetatlu) ninnu custunnaru. Mariyu varu ninnu (o muham'mad!): "Niscayanga itadu piccivadu!" Ani antunnaru
kani sarvalokala (variki) idoka hitopadesam matrame
a anivarya sanghatana (punarut'thanam)
emita anivarya sanghatana
mariyu a anivarya sanghatana, ante emito nikemi telusu
samud mariyu ad jati varu akasmattuga virucukupade a upadravanni asatyamani tiraskarincaru
kavuna samud jati varaite oka bhayankaramaina garjana dvara nasanam ceyabaddaru
mariyu ad jati varemo ati tivramaina tuphanu gali dvara nasanam ceyabaddaru
ayana (allah), danini vari mida edu ratrulu mariyu enimidi pagalla varaku edategakunda avarimpajesadu. Dani valana varu vellato pellagincabadina kharjurapu bodela vale padai povatam, nivu custavu
ayite ippudu varilo evaraina migili unnatlu nivu custunnava
phir'aun mariyu ataniki purvam gatincina varu mariyu talakrindulu ceyabadina nagarala varu, andaru goppa neralaku palpadinavare
mariyu varu tama prabhuvu pampina pravaktalaku avidheyata kanabaracaru, kavuna ayana varini kathinamaina pattuto pattukunnadu
niscayanga, eppudaite (nuh tuphan) niru haddu lekunda uppongi poyindo! Appudu memu, mim'malni payanince (navalo) ekkincamu
danini, mikoka hitabodhaganu mariyu jnapakamuncukogala cevi, danini jnapakam uncukovataniki anuvainadiga cesamu
ika eppudaite oka pedda dhvanito baka udabadutundo
mariyu bhumi mariyu parvatalu paiki ettabadi oka pedda debbato tuttuniyaluga ceyabadatayo
appudu, a rojuna sambhavincavalasina a anivarya sanghatana sambhavistundi
Mariyu a rojuna akasam braddalai potundi mariyu dani vyavastha sadali potundi
mariyu devadutalu dani (ars) prakkalalo untaru. Mariyu ni prabhuvu yokka sinhasananni (ars nu), a roju enimidi mandi (devadutalu) ettukoni untaru
a roju miru (tirpu koraku) hajaru ceyabadataru. Miru dacina e rahasyam kuda (a roju) dagi undadu
ika evanikaite tana karmapatramu kudi cetilo ivvabadutundo, atadu ila antadu: "Idigo na karmapatranni tisukoni cadavandi
niscayanga, na lekka naku tappakunda labhistundani nenu bhavincevadini
kavuna, atadu santosakaramaina jivitam gaduputadu
atyunnatamaina svargavananlo
dani pandlaguttulu, samipanlo vreladutu untayi
(varito ila anabadutundi): "Gadici poyina dinalalo miru cesi pampina karmalaku pratiphalanga, ippudu miru hayiga tinandi mariyu tragandi
ika evadikaite, tana karmapatram edama cetiki ivvabadutundo, atadu ila vapotadu: "Ayyo! Na paduganu! Na karmapatram asalu naku ivvabadakunda unte enta bagundedi
mariyu na lekka emito naku teliyakunte enta bagandedi
ayyo! Na paduganu! Adi (a maraname) naku antima maranamai unte enta bagundedi
na sampada nakemi paniki raledu
na adhikaramanta antamai poyindi
(appudu ila ajna ivvabadutundi): "Atanni pattukondi mariyu atani medalo sankellu veyandi
taruvata atanini bhagabhagamande narakagnilo veyandi
a taruvata atanini debbhai murala podavu gala golusuto bandhincandi
vastavaniki atadu sarvottamudaina allah nu visvasincevadu kadu
mariyu nirupedalaku aharam pettamani protsahincevadu kadu
kavuna, inadu ataniki ikkada e snehitudu ledu
mariyu asahyakaramaina gayala kadugu tappa, maroka aharamu ledu
danini papulu tappa marevvaru tinaru
Kavuna, nenu miru cudagalige vati sapatham cestunnanu
mariyu miru cudalenattani vati (sapatham) kuda
niscayanga, idi (i khur'an) gauravaniyudaina sandesaharuni (pai avatarimpa jeyabadina) vakku
mariyu idi oka kavi yokka vakku kadu. Miru visvasincedi cala takkuva
mariyu idi e jyatisyuni vakku kuda kadu! Miru grahincedi cala takkuva
idi sarvalokala prabhuvu taraphu nundi avatarincindi
okavela itanu (i pravakta), ma (allah nu) gurinci edaina abad'dhapu mata kalpinci unte
memu atani kudi cetini pattukune varam
taruvata atani (meda) raktanalanni kosevaram
appudu milo nundi e okkadu kuda atanini (ma siksa nundi) kapada leka poyevadu
mariyu niscayanga, idi (i khur'an) daivabhiti gala varikoka hitopadesam
mariyu niscayanga milo kondaru dinini (i khur'an nu) asatyamani anevaru unnarani maku baga telusu
mariyu niscayanga, idi (i tiraskaram) satyatiraskarulaku duhkha karanamavutundi
mariyu niscayanga, idi (i khur'an) nam'madagina satyam
kavuna nivu sarvottamudaina ni prabhuvu pavitra namanni stutincu
prasnincevadu, a anivaryamaina siksanu gurinci prasnincadu
satyatiraskarulaku vidhincabade dani gurinci; danini evvadu tolagincaledu
adi arohana margalaku yajamanudaina allah taraphu nundi vastundi
yabhai vela sanvatsaralaku samanamaina (pramanam gala) oka rojulo, devadutalu mariyu atma (jibril) ayana vaddaku adhirohistaru
kavuna (o muham'mad!) Nivu sahanam vahincu, uttamamaina sahananto
vastavaniki, varu (prajalu) adi (a dinam) duranga undani anukuntunnaru
kani makadi ati daggaralo kanipistondi
a roju akasam marige sisam vale (nune vale) ayi potundi
mariyu kondalu ekina unni vale ayi potayi
Mariyu prana snehitudu kuda tana snehituni (ksemanni) adagadu
varu okarinokaru cusukuntu untaru. A roju aparadhi tana santananni pariharanga icci ayina siksa nundi tappincukogorutadu
mariyu tana sahavasini mariyu tana sodarunni
mariyu tanaku asrayamiccina daggari bandhuvulanu
mariyu bhumilo unna varinandarini kuda icci ayina, tanu vimukti pondalani korutadu
kani ala kaneradu! Niscayanga, a mande agnijvala (atani koraku veci untundi)
adi atani carmanni purtiga valaci kalci vestundi
adi (satyam nundi) venudirigi mariyu vennu cupi, poyevarini (andarini) pilustundi
mariyu (dhananni) kudabetti, danini dacevarini
niscayanga, manavudu atragaduga (tondarapadevadiga) srstincabaddadu
tanaku kidu kaliginappudu vadu andolana cendutadu
mariyu tanaku melu kaliginapudu svarthaparuniga pravartistadu
namaj nu khacchitanga pathincevaru tappa
evaraite tama namaj nu sada niyamanto patistaro
mariyu alanti varu, evaraite tama sampadalalo (itarulaku) unna hakkunu sam'matistaro
yacakulaku mariyu lemiki guri ayina variki
mariyu alanti variki, evaraite tirpudinanni satyamani nam'mutaro
mariyu evaraite tama prabhuvu siksaku bhayapadutaro
niscayanga, vari prabhuvu yokka a siksa; dani patla evvaru nirbhayanga undaleru
mariyu evaraite, tama marmangalanu kapadukuntaro
tama bharyalu (ajvaj), leda dharmasam'matanga tama adhinanlo unna (banisa) strilato tappa - alantappudu varu nindar'hulu karu
kani evaraite vitini minci pogorutaro, alantivare mitimiri poyevaru
mariyu evaraite tama amanatulanu mariyu tama vagdanalanu kapadukuntaro
mariyu evaraite tama saksyala mida sthiranga untaro
Mariyu evaraite tama namajulanu kapadukuntaro
ilanti varanta sagauravanga svargavanalalo untaru
i satyatiraskarulaku emayyindi? Virenduku hadavidiga, ni mundu itu atu tirugutunnaru
kudi prakka nundi mariyu edama prakka nundi gumpuluga
emi? Varilo prati okkadu, tanu parama sukhalu gala svargavananlo pravesimpa jeyabadatanani asistunnada
ala kaneradu! Niscayanga, memu varini denito puttincamo variki baga telusu
kavuna! Nenu turpula mariyu padamarala prabhuvu sapatham cesi cebutunnanu. Niscayanga, memu ala ceyagala samarthulamu
variki baduluga vari kante uttamamaina varini vari sthananlo tisukuravataniki; mariyu mam'malni minci poyevaru evvaru leru
kavuna varini - varito vagdanam ceyabadina a dinaniki cere varaku - vyarthapu matalalo mariyu vilasa vinodallo vidicipettu
a roju varu tama samadhula nundi leci, tama gamyasthanalaku cerukovataniki tondara padutu veganga bayatiki vastaru
vari cupulu krindiki vali untayi, avamanam varini kram'mukoni untundi. Ade variki vagdanam ceyabadina dinam
niscayanga, memu nuh nu atani jati vari vaddaku: "Varipai badhakaramaina siksa rakamunde varini heccarincu!" Ani (ajnapinci) pampamu
atanu varito ila annadu: "O na jati prajalara! Niscayanga, nenu miku spastanga heccarika ceyataniki vaccina vadini
kavuna miru allah ne aradhincandi mariyu ayana yandu bhayabhaktulu kaligi undandi mariyu nannu anusarincandi

ala ceste ayana mi papalanu ksamistadu. Mariyu oka niyamita kalam varaku mim'malni vadali pedtadu. Niscayanga, allah nirnayincina kalam vaccinapudu, danini tappincadam sadhyam kadu. Idi miru telusukunte enta bagundedi
Atanu ila prarthincadu: "O na prabhu! Niscayanga, nenu na jativarini reyimbavallu pilicanu
kani, na pilupu, vari palayananni matrame heccincindi

mariyu vastavaniki, nenu varini, ni ksamabhiksa vaipunaku pilicinappudalla, varu tama cevulalo vrellu durcukunevaru mariyu tama vastralanu tamapai kappukunevaru mariyu varu mondi vaikhari avalambistu durahankaranlo munigi undevaru
taruvata vastavaniki, nenu varini elugetti pilicanu
a taruvata vastavanga, nenu variki bahiranganga cati ceppanu mariyu ekantanlo rahasyanga pilicanu
inka varito ila annanu: 'Mi prabhuvunu ksamapanakai vedukondi, niscayanga ayana ento ksamasiludu
ayana mipai akasam nundi dharalanga varsanni kuripimpajestadu
mariyu miku dhana sampadalalonu mariyu santananlonu vrd'dhi nosangutadu mariyu mi koraku totalanu utpatti cestadu. Mariyu nadulanu pravahimpajestadu
mikemayindi? Miru allah mahattvamunu enduku adarincaru
mariyu vastavaniki ayane mim'malni vibhinna dasalalo srstincadu
emi? Miru cudatam leda? Allah edu akasalanu e vidhanga antastulalo srstincado
mariyu vati madhya candrunni (pratibimbince) kantiganu mariyu suryunni (velige) dipam ganu cesadu
mariyu allah ye mim'malni bhumi (matti) nundi utpatti cesadu
taruvata ayana mim'malni anduloke tisukoni potadu mariyu mim'malni dani nundi (bratikinci) bayatiki tistadu
mariyu allah ye mi koraku bhumini vistarimpajesadu
miru danipai nunna visalamaina margalalo nadavataniki
Nuh inka ila vinnavincukunnadu: "O na prabhu! Vastavaniki varu na matanu dhikkarincaru. Mariyu vadini anusarincaru, evadi sampada mariyu santanam variki kevalam nastam tappa maremi adhikam ceyado
mariyu varu pedda kutra pannaru
mariyu varu okaritonokaru ila anukunnaru: 'Miru mi aradhyadaivalanu vidici pettakandi. Vadd mariyu suva'a; yagus, ya'ukh mariyu nasr lanu vidicipettakandi
mariyu vastavaniki, varu cala mandini tappu darilo padavesaru. Kavuna (o na prabhu!): Nivu kuda i durmargulaku kevalam vari margabhrastatvanne heccincu
varu tama papala karananga munci veyabaddaru mariyu narakagniloki troyabaddaru, kavuna varu allah tappa tamanu kapade varinevvarini pondaleka poyaru
mariyu nuh ila prarthincadu: "O na prabhu! Satyatiraskarulalo okkarini kuda bhumi mida vadalaku
okavela nivu varini vadali pedite, niscayanga varu ni dasulanu margabhrastatvanlo padavestaru. Mariyu varu papulanu mariyu krtaghnulanu matrame puttistaru

o ma prabhu! Nannu, na tallidandrulanu mariyu visvasiga na intiloniki pravesincina vanini mariyu visvasulaina purusulanu mariyu visvasulaina strilanu, andarini ksamincu. Mariyu durmargulaku vinasam tappa maremi adhikam ceyaku

(o pravakta!) Ila anu: "Naku i vidhanga divyasandesam pampabadindi; niscayanga, oka jinnatula samuham - dinini (i khur'an nu) vini - tama jati varito ila annaru: 'Vastavaniki memu oka adbhutamaina pathanam (khur'an) vinnamu
adi saraina margam vaipunaku margadarsakatvam cestundi. Kavuna memu danini visvasincamu. Mariyu memu ma prabhuvuku evvadini kuda bhagasvamiga sati kalpincamu
Mariyu niscayanga, ma prabhuvu vaibhavam ento unnatamainadi. Ayana evvadini bharyaga (sahibatun ga) gani, kumaruniga gani cesukoledu
mariyu niscayanga, manaloni avivekulu, kondaru allah visayanlo darunamaina matalu palukutunnaru
mariyu vastavaniki manam manavulu gani, jinnatulu gani allah nu gurinci abad'dham palakarani bhavincevaramu
mariyu vastavaniki, manavulalo nundi kondaru purusulu, jinnatulalo nundi kondaru purusula saranu vedutu undevaru. I vidhanga varu, vari (jinnatula) talabirusutanam marinta adhikame cesevaru
mariyu vastavaniki, varu (manavulu) kuda miru (jinnatulu) bhavincinatlu, allah evvadini kuda sandesaharuniga pampadani bhavincaru
mariyu niscayanga, memu akasalalo (rahasyalanu) tongi cudataniki prayatnincinapudu, memu danini kathinamaina kavalivarito mariyu agni jvalalato nindi undatanni cusamu
mariyu vastavaniki purvam akkadi matalu vinataniki memu rahasyanga akkada kurcunevaram. Kani ippudu evadaina (rahasyanga) vine prayatnam ceste, atadi koraku akkada oka agnijvala ponci untundi
mariyu vastavaniki bhumilo unna variki edaina kidu uddesimpabadinda, leka vari prabhuvu variki saraina margam cupagorutunnada ane visayam maku artham kavadam ledu
mariyu vastavaniki, manalo kondaru sadvartanulunnaru, marikondaru daniki virud'dhanga unnaru. Vastavaniki manam vibhinna margalanu anusaristu vaccamu
mariyu niscayanga, memu allah nundi bhulokanlo tappincukolemu, ani artham cesukunnamu. Mariyu paripoyi kuda ayana nundi tappincukolemu

Mariyu niscayanga, memu i margadarsakatvanni (khur'an nu) vinnappudu danini visvasincamu. Kavuna evadaina tana prabhuvunu visvasistado atadiki tana satkarmala phalitanlo nastanni gurinci mariyu siksalo heccimpunu gurinci bhayapade avasaram undadu

mariyu niscayanga, manalo kondaru allah ku vidheyulaina varu (muslinlu) unnaru. Marikondaru niscayanga, an'yayaparulu (satyaniki duramaina varu) unnaru. Kavuna evaraite allah ku vidheyata (islam) nu avalambincaro, alanti vare saraina marganni kanugonna varu
mariyu an'yayaparule (satyaniki duramainavaru) narakaniki indhanamayye varu
okavela varu (satyatiraskarulu) rjumargam mida sthiranga unnatlaite, memu varipai puskalanga nitini kuripince varamu
danto varini pariksincataniki! Mariyu evadaite tana prabhuvu dhan'yam nundi vimukhudavutado, ayana vanini tivramaina siksaku guri cestadu
mariyu niscayanga, masjidulu allah korake pratyekincabaddayi. Kavuna vatilo allah to patu itarulevvarini prarthincakandi
mariyu niscayanga, allah yokka dasudu (muham'mad) ayana (allah)nu prarthincataniki nilabadi nappudu, varu (jinnatulu) atana cuttu dattanga (atani khur'an pathananni vinataniki) gumi gudutaru
varito ila anu: "Niscayanga nenu na prabhuvunu matrame prarthistanu mariyu ayanaku evvarini sati kalpincanu
varito ila anu: "Niscayanga, miku kidu ceyatam gani, leda saraina margam cupatam gani na vasanlo ledu
inka ila anu: "Niscayanga, nannu allah nundi evvadunu kapadaledu mariyu naku ayana tappa marokari asrayam kuda ledu

(Na pani) kevalam allah upadesanni mariyu ayana sandesanni andajeyatame!" Ika evadaite allah mariyu ayana pravakta ajnanu ullanghistado! Atadu niscayanga, narakagniki guri avutadu; andulo sasvatanga kalakalam untadu
civaraku variki vagdanam ceyabadina danini varu cusinappudu, evari sahayakulu balahinulo, marevari vargam sankhyaparanga takkuvo variki telisi potundi
ila anu: "Miku vagdanam ceyabadinadi (siksa) samipanlone ranunnado, leka dani koraku na prabhuvu dirghakala vyavadhi niyamincado naku teliyadu
ayane agocara jnanam galavadu, kavuna ayana agocara visayalu evvadiki teliyajeyadu
tanu kori ennukonna pravaktaku tappa - endukante, ayana niscayanga, atani (a pravakta) mundu mariyu venuka raksakabhatulanu niyamistadu

varu, (pravaktalu) tama prabhuvu yokka sandesalanu yathatathanga andajestunnarani parisilincadaniki. Mariyu ayana vari anni visayalanu parivestinci unnadu mariyu ayana prati okka visayanni lekka petti uncutadu
o duppati kappukunnavada
ratranta (namaj lo) nilabadu, konta bhaganni vidici
dani sagabhaganlo, leda dani kante konta takkuva
leda dani kante konta ekkuva; mariyu khur'an nu agi agi nem'madiga spastanga pathincu
niscayanga, memu nipai bharamaina sandesanni avatarimpa jeyabotunnamu
niscayanga, ratrivela levatam (manas'sunu) adupulo uncukovataniki ento upayuktamainadi mariyu (allah) pravacanalanu (artham cesukovataniki) kuda ento anuganamainadi
vastavaniki, pagativela niku cala panuluntayi
mariyu nivu ni prabhuvu namanni smaristu undu. Mariyu atyanta sradthato ayana vaipuku maralutu undu
ayane turpu padamarala svami, ayana tappa maroka aradhya daivam ledu, kavuna nivu ayanane karyakartaga cesuko
Mariyu varu palike matalaku sahanam vahincu mariyu mancitananto vari nundi tolagipo
mariyu asatyavadulaina i sampannulanu, naku vadalipettu. Mariyu variki konta vyavadhinivvu
niscayanga, ma vadda vari koraku sankellu mariyu bhagabhagamande narakagni unnayi
mariyu gontulo irukkupoye aharam mariyu badhakaramaina siksa (unnayi)
a roju bhumi mariyu parvatalu kampinci potayi. Mariyu parvatalu pravahince isuka dibbaluga maripotayi
memu phir'aun vaddaku sandesaharunni pampinatlu, niscayanga mi vaddaku kuda oka sandesaharunni, miku saksiga undataniki pampamu
kani phir'aun a sandesaharuniki avidheyata cupadu. Kavuna memu atanini tivramaina siksaku guri cesamu
okavela miru satyanni tiraskariste, baluranu musalivariga cesetatu vanti a dinapu siksa nundi ela tappincukogalaru
appudu akasam braddalai potundi. Ayana yokka vagdanam tappaka neraveri tirutundi
niscayanga, idoka upadesam kavuna istamaina vadu tana prabhuvu vaddaku poye marganni avalambincavaccu

(O muham'mad!) Nivu, vastavaniki dadapu mudinta rendu vantula ratri leka sagam (ratri) leka mudinta oka bhagam (namaj lo) nilustavanedi ni prabhuvuku baga telusu. Mariyu nito patu unna varilo kondaru kuda! Mariyu allah reyimbavalla parimanalanu nirnayistadu. Miru khacchitanga purti ratri prarthincalerani ayanaku telusu. Kavuna ayana mi vaipunaku (kanikaranto) maraladu. Kavuna khur'an nu, miru sulabhanga pathincagaliginante pathincandi. Milo kondaru vyadhigrastulu kavaccu, marikondaru allah anugrahanni anvesistu bhumilo prayananlo undavaccu. Marikondaru allah marganlo dharmayud'dham cestu undavaccu ani ayanaku baga telusu. Kavuna miku danilo sulabhamainanta danine pathincandi. Mariyu namajnu sthapincandi, vidhidanam (jakat) ivvandi. Mariyu allah ku manci appunu, appuga istu undandi. Mariyu miru, mi koraku munduga cesi pampukunna manci karyalannintini allah daggara pondutaru. Ade cala uttamamainadi. Mariyu dani pratiphalam cala goppadi. Mariyu miru allah nu ksamabhiksa arthistu undandi. Niscayanga, allah ksamasiludu, apara karuna pradata
o duppatilo cuttukunnavada
le! Ika heccarincu
mariyu mi prabhuvu goppatananni (ghanatanu) koniyadu (cati ceppu)
mariyu ni vastralanu parisubhranga uncuko
mariyu malin'yaniki duranga undu
mariyu ekkuva pondalane asato ivvaku (upakaram ceyaku)
mariyu ni prabhuvu koraku sahanam vahincu
mariyu baka (nakhur) udabadinappudu
a dinam cala kathinamaina dinamai untundi
satyatiraskarulaku adi sulabhamaina (dinam) kadu
vadalandi! Nannu mariyu nenu ontariga puttincina vanini
mariyu nenu ataniki puskalanga sampadaniccanu
mariyu ataniki toduga unde kumarulanu
Mariyu atanu koraku atani jivana saukaryalanu sulabham cesanu
ayina nenu ataniki inka ivvalani atadu asistu untadu
ala kadu! Vastavaniki atadu ma (allah) sucanala (ayat la) patla virodham kaligi vunnadu
nenu tvaralone atanini durgamamaina sthananiki (siksaku) nettutanu
vastavaniki, atadu alocincadu mariyu manas'sulo pranalika cesukunnadu
kavuna (atanini) tanu pranalika cesukunnatlu nasananiki guri kanivvandi
avunu (atanini) tanu pranalika cesukunnatlu, nasananiki guri kanivvandi
appudu atadu alocincadu
taruvata atadu nudaru citlincukunnadu mariyu kopanto cusadu (mukham madcukunnadu)
taruvata atadu venukaku marali durahankaram cupadu
appudu atadu ila annadu: "Idi purva nundi vastu vunna oka mantrajalam matrame
idi kevalam oka manava hakku matrame
tvaralone nenu atanini narakagnilo kalcutanu
mariyu a narakagni ante nivu emanukuntunnavu
adi (evarini) migalcadu mariyu vadali pettadu
adi manavunni (atadi carmannidahinci vestundi)
danipai pandom'midi (devadutalu niyamincabadi) unnaru

Mariyu memu devadutalanu matrame narakaniki raksakuluga niyamincamu. Mariyu memu vari sankhyanu (pandom'midini), satyatiraskarulaku oka pariksaga, grantha prajalaku nam'makam kalagataniki, visvasula visvasanni adhikam ceyataniki mariyu grantha prajalu mariyu visvasulu sandehanlo padakunda undataniki mariyu tama hrdayalalo rogamunna varu mariyu satyatiraskarulu: "I upamanam ivvatanlo allah uddesamemiti?" Ani palukataniki! I vidhanga allah tanu korina varini margabhrastatvanlo vadalutadu. Mariyu tanu korina variki margadarsakatvam cestadu. Mariyu ni prabhuvu sain'yalanu ayana tappa marevvaru erugaru. Mariyu idanta manavuniki oka jnapika matrame
ala kadu! Candruni saksiga
gadicipoye ratri saksiga
prakasince, udayam saksiga
niscayanga, idi (i narakagni prastavana) oka goppa visayam
manavuniki oka heccarika
milo munduku ravalani korukune vaniki leda venuka undi poyevaniki
prati manavudu tanu cesina karmalaku takattuga untadu
kudipaksam varu tappa
varu svargalalo untu okarinokaru ila prasnincukuntaru
aparadhulanu gurinci (mariyu varito antaru)
mim'malni e visayam narakanloki pravesimpajesindi
varu (narakavasulu) ila javabistaru: "Memu namaj cese vallam kamu
mariyu nirupedalaku aharam pettevallam kamu
mariyu vrtha kalaksepam cese varito kalisi vyartha pralapalu (prasangalu) cestu unde vallamu
mariyu tirpudinanni abad'dhamani nirakaristu undevallamu
civaraku a anivaryamaina ghadiya mapai vacci padindi
appudu sipharasu cesevari sipharasu variki e matram upayogapadadu
ayite, varikemayindi? I hitopadesam nundi varenduku mukham trippukuntunnaru
vari sthiti bedirina adavi gadidala madiriga undi
Sinham nundi paripoye (gadidala madiriga)
ala kadu! Varilo prati okka vyakti tanaku vippabadina granthalu ivvabadalani korutunnadu
kadu! Kadu! Asalu varu paraloka jivitam gurinci bhayapadatam ledu
ala kadu! Niscayanga, idi oka hitopadesam
kavuna korinavadu dini nundi hitabodha grahincavaccu
kani allah korite tappa! Viru dini nundi hitabodha grahincaleru. Ayane (allah ye) bhayabhaktulaku ar'hudu mariyu ayane ksamince ar'hata galavadu
ala kadu! Nenu punarut'thana dinapu sapatham cestunnanu
ala kadu! Nenu tananu tanu nindincukune antaratma sapatham cestunnanu
emiti? Memu atani emukalanu progu ceyalemani manavudu bhavistunnada
vastavaniki! Memu atani vrella konalanu guda sarigga savarincagala samardhulamu
ayina, manavudu ika mida kuda duskaryalu ceyagorutunnadu
atadu: "Ayite i punarut'thana dinam eppudu vastundi?" Ani adugutunnadu
kallu mirumitlugonnappudu
mariyu candruniki grahanam pattinappudu
mariyu suryacandrulu kalipi veyabadinappudu
manavudu a roju: "Ekkadiki pari povali?" Ani antadu
adi kadu! (Ataniki) ekkada saranam undadu
a roju ni prabhuvu vaddane asrayam untundi
a roju manavudiki, tanu cesi pampandi mariyu venaka vadalindi anta telupabadutundi
ala kadu! Manavudu tanaku virud'dhanga, tane saksi avutadu
mariyu atadu enni sakulu ceppina sare
nivu dinini (i khur'an nu grahincataniki) ni nalukanu tvaratvaraga kadilincaku
niscayanga, dinini sekarincatam mariyu dinini cadivincatam ma badhyate
kavuna memu dinini pathincinappudu nivu a parayananni srad'dhaga anusarincu
ika dani bhavanni arthamayyela ceyatam ma badhyate
Ala kadu! Vastavaniki miru aniscitamaina (ihaloka jivitam patla) vyamoham pencukuntunnaru
mariyu paraloka jivitanni vadali pedutunnaru
a rojuna konni mukhalu kalakala ladutu untayi
tama prabhuvu (allah) vaipunaku custu untayi
marikonni mukhalu a roju, kantihinamai untayi
nadumunu virice badha variki kalugutundani bhavinci
ala kadu! Pranam gontuloki vaccinapudu
mariyu: "Evadaina unnada? Atanini (maranam nundi) kapadataniki?" Ani anabadutundi
mariyu appudatadu vastavaniki tana edabatu kalam vaccindani grahistadu
mariyu oka pikka maroka pikkato kalisipotundi
a roju ni prabhuvu vaipunake prayanam untundi
kani atadu satyanni nam'maledu mariyu namaj salapanu ledu
mariyu atadu (i sandesanni) asatyamannadu mariyu dani nundi venudirigadu
a taruvata nikkutu nilgutu tana intivari vaddaku poyadu
(o satyatiraskaruda!) Niku nasanam mida nasanam ranunnadi
avunu, niku nasanam mida nasanam ranunnadi
emiti? Manavudu tananu viccala vidiga vadalipettandam jarugutundani bhavistunnada
emi? Atadu prasarimpa jeyabadina oka viryabinduvu kada
taruvata oka raktakandaga (jalagaga) undevadu kada? Taruvata ayane (allah ye) atanini srstinci atani rupanni tircididdadu
a taruvata atani nundi stri purusula rendu rakalanu (jatulanu) erparacadu
alantappudu ayanaku maranincina varini malli bratikince samarthyam leda
ananta kalacakranlo, manavudu tanu ceppukodagina vastuvu kakunda unna samayam gadavaleda
niscayanga, memu manavunni oka misrama viryabinduvuto srstincamu. Atanini pariksincataniki, memu atanini vinevadiga, cusevadiga cesamu
Niscayanga, memu ataniki margam cupamu. Ika atadu krtajnudu kavaccu, leda krtaghnudu kavaccu
niscayanga, memu satyatiraskarula koraku sankellanu, medalo pattalanu mariyu bhagabhaga mande narakagnini (sa'iranusid'dhaparaci untamu)
niscayanga, punyatmulu kaphur ane oka celama nundi oka ginnelo teccina (paniyanni) tragutaru
dharalanga pongi pravahimpa jeyabade utala nundi, allah dasulu tragutu untaru
varu tama mokkubadulanu purti cesukunnavarai untaru. Mariyu dani hani anni vaipula kram'mukone, a dinamunu gurinci bhayapadutu untaru
mariyu adi tamaku pritikaramainappatiki varu nirupedalaku mariyu anathalaku mariyu khaidilaku, aharam pettevarai untaru
vara (varito ila antaru): "Vastavaniki memu allah prasannata korake miku aharam pedutunnamu. Memu mi nundi elanti pratiphalam gani, leda krtajnatalu gani asincatam ledu
niscayanga, memu ma prabhuvu nundi vacce ugramaina, durbharamaina, a dinaniki bhayapadutunnamu
kavuna allah varini a dinapu kidu nundi kapadadu. Mariyu variki ullasanni mariyu anandanni prasadincadu
mariyu vari sahananiki pratiphalanga variki svarganni mariyu pattu vastralanu iccadu
andulo, varu ettaina pithala mida dindlaku anukoni kurconi untaru. Andulo varu enda (badha) gani, cali tivratanu gani cudaru
mariyu andulo varipai nidalu padutuntayi. Dani phalala guttulu variki andubatulo untayi
mariyu vari madhya vendi patralu mariyu gajuglasulu trippa badutu untayi
a gaju glasulu sphatikam vale tellavaina vendito ceyabadi untayi. Avi niyamabad'dham nimpabadi untayi
mariyu variki sonti kalipina madhupatralu tragataniki ivvabadatayi
Adi svarganloni sal sabil ane peru gala oka uta
mariyu vari madya sasvatanga, yavvanuluga unte baluru tirugutu untaru. Mariyu nivu varini custe, varini vedajallina mutyaluga bhavistavu
mariyu nivu akkada (svarganlo) custe, ekkada cusina anandame pondutavu. Mariyu oka mahattara samrajya vaibhavam kanipistundi

vari onti mida sannani akupaccani sresthamaina pattu vastralu mariyu bangaru jalataru allina dustuluntayi. Mariyu variki vendi kankanalu todigincabadatayi. Mariyu vari prabhuvu variki nirmalamaina paniyanni tragataniki prasadistadu
(varito ila anabadutundi): "Niscayanga, idi miku ivvabade pratiphalam. Endukante, mi srama angirincabadindi
niscayanga, meme, i khur'an nu, ni pai (o muham'mad!) Kramakramanga avatarimpajesamu
kavuna nivu ni prabhuvu yokka ajnapai sthiranga undu mariyu viriloni e papi yokka leda satyatiraskaruni yokka mata gani vinaku
mariyu ni prabhuvu namanni udayam mariyu sayantram smaristu undu
mariyu ratrivela ayana sannidhilo sastangam (sajda) cestu undu mariyu ratrivela sudirgha kalam, ayana pavitratanu koniyadutu undu
niscayanga, viru aniscitamaina i prapancika jivitam patla mohitulai vunnaru. Mariyu munmundu ranunna bharamaina dinani vismaristunnaru
meme virini srstincinavaramu mariyu viri sariranni drdha paricina varamu. Mariyu memu korinappudu viriki baduluga viri vanti varini tegalamu
niscayanga, idoka hitopadesam kavuna istapadinavadu tana prabhuvu vaipunaku poye marganni avalambincavaccu
mariyu allah korakapote, miru koredi (jaragadu)! Niscayanga, allah sarvajnudu, mahavivekavantudu
Ayana tanu korinavarini tana karunyanloki tisukuntadu. Mariyu durmargula koraku ayana badhakaramaina siksanu sid'dhaparaci uncadu
okadani taruvata okati, varusaga pampabade vayuvula saksiga
mariyu tivramaina vegato vice vayuvula saksiga
mariyu meghalanu duraduranga vyapimpajese vayuvula saksiga
mariyu manci cedulanu visadaparace (daivadutala) saksiga
sandesalanu pravaktala vaddaku tecce (daivaduta) saksiga
sakuga leka heccarikaga
niscayanga, miku vagdanam ceyabadinadi, jaragavalasi undi
appudu eppadaite naksatralu kanti hinamai potayo
mariyu akasam cilipotundo

Mariyu nindi porle (madhu) patra
andulo (svarganlo) varu elanti vyarthapu matalu gani, asatyalu gani vinaru

e rojunayite atma (jibril) mariyu devadutalu varusalalo nilici untaro! Appudu a ananta karunamayudu anumatincina vadu tappa, marevvaru matladaleru; okavela evadaina matladina atadu saraina mate matladutadu
ade antima satyadinam. Kavuna istamunnavadu, tana prabhuvu vaipunaku cere marganni avalambincali

niscayanga, memu atani samipanlo unna siksanu gurinci mim'malni heccarincamu. A roju prati manisi tana cejetula cesukoni mundu pampukunnadanta pratyaksanga cusukuntadu. Mariyu satyatiraskari: "Ayyo! Na paduganu! Nenu mattinayi unte enta bagundedi!" Ani vapotadu
(avisvasula pranalanu) kathinanga lagi tise vari (devadutala) saksiga
(visvasula pranalanu) nem'madiga tisevari (devadutala) saksiga

mariyu pandenlo vale (okarito nokaru) poti pade vari saksiga
mariyu (tama prabhuvu) ajnanusaram vyavaharalu nirvahincevari (devadutala) saksiga
a roju (modati) baka dhvani bhugolanni tivranga kampimpajestundi
dani tarvata rendava sari baka udabadutundi. (Appudu andaru punarut'tharimpa badataru)
a roju (konni) hrdayalu (bhayanto) dadadadaladutu untayi
vari cupulu krindiki vali untayi
varu ila antunnaru: "Emi? Manam mana purva sthitiloki malli tisuku rabadatama
manam sithilamaina emukaluga mari poyina taruvata kudana
Varu (inka ila) antaru: "Ayite i tirigi ravatamanedi cala nastadayakamainade
kani adi vastavaniki, oke oka (tivramaina) dhvani
appudu varandaru, okesari leci maidananloki vacci untaru
emi? Niku musa vrttantam andinda
atani prabhuvu pavitra tuva loyalo atanini pilicinappudu

ika (atanito) itlanu: 'Emi? Nivu paparahitudavu avataniki istapadatava
mariyu nenu niku ni prabhuvu vaipunaku margadarsakatvam cestanu, mari nivu ayana patla bhiti kaligi untava
taruvata atanu (musa) atadiki (phir'aun ku) goppa adbhuta nidarsananni cupadu
kani atadu (phir'aun) danini abad'dhamani tiraskarincadu mariyu (atani matanu) ullanghincadu
a tarvata atadu (phir'aun) venakki marali poyi, (kutralu) pannasagadu
pidapa (prajalanu) samavesaparaci, elugetti catutu
ila annadu: "Nene mi yokka mahannata prabhuvunu
kavuna allah atanini ihaparalokala siksaku guri cesadu
niscayanga, indulo (allah ku) bhayapade prati vyakti koraku gunapathamundi
emi? Mim'malni srstincadam kathinamayina pana? Leka akasanna? Ayane kada danini nirmincindi
ayana dani kappu (ettu)nu cala paiki lepadu. Taruvata danini kramaparicadu
mariyu ayana dani ratrini cikatiga cesadu. Mariyu dani pagatini (velugunu) bahirgatam cesadu
mariyu a pidapa bhumini paracinatlu cesadu
dani nundi dani nillanu mariyu dani paccikanu bayatiki tisadu
mariyu parvatalanu (danilo) sthiranga natadu
miku mariyu mi pasuvulaku jivana samagriga
ika a goppa durghatana (punarut'thana dinam) vaccinappudu
a roju manavudu tanu cesindanta jnapakam cesukuntadu
Mariyu cuse vari yedutaku, narakagni spastanga kanabadetatlu tebadutundi
ika dhikkaranto haddulu miri pravartincina vadiki
mariyu aihika jivitaniki pradhan'yata niccina vadiki
niscayanga, narakagniye, vani nivasa sthanamavutundi
mariyu tana prabhuvu mundu nilabada valasi vuntundanna bhayanto tana manas'sunu dustavanchalaku duranga uncina vyaktiki
niscayanga, svargame, atani nivasa sthanamavutundi
(o muham'mad!) Viru ninnu - a ghadiyanu gurinci: "Asalu adi eppudostundi?" Ani adugutunnaru
dani gurinci ceppadaniki danto nikemi sambandham
dani vastava jnanam ni prabhuvuke undi
(o muham'mad!) Niscayanga, nivu, daniki bhayapade varini heccarince vadavu matrame
varu danini cusina roju (tamu prapancanlo) kevalam oka sayantramo leka oka udayamo gadipinatlu bhavistaru
atanu (pravakta) bhrkuti mudi vesukunnadu mariyu mukham trippukunnadu
a gruddivadu tana vaddaku vaccadani
kani nikem telusu? Bahusa atadu tananu tanu sanskarincukovaccu
leda atadu hitabodha pondavaccu mariyu a hitabodha ataniki prayojanakaram kavaccu
kani atadu, evadaite tananu tanu svayam samrd'dhudu, anukuntunnado
atani patla nivu asakti cuputunnavu
okavela atadu sanskarincukoka pote nipai badhyata emundi
kani, evadaite tanantata tanu, ni vaddaku parugettukuntu vaccado
mariyu (allah yedala) bhitiparudai unnado
atanini nivu nirlaksyam cestunnavu
ala kadu! Niscayanga, idi (i khur'an) oka hitopadesam
kavuna istamunnavaru dinini svikarincavaccu
idi pratisthakaramaina putalalo (vrayabadi unnadi)
mahonnatamainadi, pavitramainadi
lekhakula (devadutala) cetulalo
varu gauravaniyulaina satpurusulu (ajnanuvartanulu)
Manavudu nasanam ganu! Atadu enta krtaghnudu
ayana (allah) denito atanini srstincadu
atanini viryabinduvuto srstincadu taruvata atanini tagina vidhanga tircididdadu
a taruvata, atani marganni ataniki sulabhataram cesadu
apaina atanini maranimpajesi gori loki cercadu
malli ayana (allah) korinappudu atanini tirigi bratikinci lepadu
ala kadu, ayana (allah) adesincina danini (manavudu) neravercaledu
ika, manavudu tana aharanni gamanincali
niscayanga memu nitini (varsanni) enta puskalanga kuripincamu
a taruvata bhumini (molice mokkalato) cilcamu, oka adbhutamaina cilputo
taruvata danilo dhan'yanni pencamu
mariyu draksalanu mariyu kuragayalanu
mariyu aliv (jaitun) mariyu kharjurapu cetlanu
mariyu dattamaina totalanu
mariyu (rakarakala) pandlanu mariyu paccikalanu
miku mariyu mi pasuvulaku jivana samagriga
eppudaite, cevulanu cevitiga cese a goppa dhvani vastundo
a roju, manavudu tana sodaruni nundi duranga paripotadu
mariyu tana talli nundi mariyu tandri nundi
mariyu tana bharya (sahibati) nundi mariyu tana santanam nundi
a roju varilo prati manavuniki tananu gurinci matrame calinanta cinta untundi
a roju konni mukhalu anandanto prakasistu untayi
avi cirunavvulato anandotsahalato kalakalaladutuntayi
marikonni mukhalu a roju, dum'mu kottukoni (ento vyakulanto) nindi untayi
avi nallaga madipoyi untayi
alanti varu, vare! Satyatiraskarulaina dustulu
suryudu (andhakaranlo) cutti poyabadi kantihinudainappudu
mariyu naksatralu (kantini kolpoyi) ralipovunappudu
mariyu parvatalu kadilincabadinappudu
mariyu nindu sudi ontelu, nirapeksanga vadiliveyabadinappudu
Mariyu kruramrgalanni okaceta samakurcabadinappudu
mariyu samudralu uppongipoyi nappudu
mariyu atmalu (sariralato) tirigi kalupabadi nappudu
mariyu sajivanga pati pettabadina balika prasnincabadinappudu
e aparadhaniki tanu hatya ceyabadindani
mariyu karmapatralu teruvabadinappudu
mariyu akasam olici veyabadinappudu
mariyu narakagni mandincabadinappudu
mariyu svargam daggaraku tisukurabadinappudu
prati atma tanu cesi teccina karmalanu telusukuntundi
ala kadu! Nenu tolagipoye naksatrala saksiga cebutunnanu
(evaite) veganga tirugutu kanumarugavutunnayo
mariyu gadaci poye ratri saksiga
mariyu prakasince udayam saksiga
niscayanga, idi (i khur'an) gauravaniyudaina sandesaharudu teccina vakku
atanu (jibril) maha balasali, sinhasana (ars) adhipati sannidhilo unnata sthanam galavadu
atani ajnalu patimpabadatayi mariyu (atanu) visvasaniyudu
mariyu (o prajalara!) Mi sahacarudu piccivadu kadu
mariyu vastavanga, atanu a sandesaharunni (jibril nu) prakasavantamaina dinmandalanlo cusadu
mariyu atanu (muham'mad) agocara jnananni prajala nundi dacevadu kadu
mariyu idi (i khur'an) sapinca (bahiskarinca) badina saitan vakku kadu
mari miru etu potunnaru
idi (i khur'an) sarvalokalaku oka hitopadesam
milo, rjumarganlo nadava dalacukunna prativani koraku
mariyu sarvalokala prabhuvaina allah talacananta varaku, miru talacinanta matrana emi kadu
akasam cilcabadinappudu
mariyu naksatralu cediri poyinappudu
mariyu samudralu pongi porali poyinappudu
mariyu samadhulu pellagimpa (teruva) badinappudu
prati vyaktiki tanu cesi pampukunnadi mariyu venuka vadali pettindi anta telisi potundi
O manavuda! Paramadata ayina ni prabhuvunu gurinci, e visayam ninnu emarupatuku guri cesindi
ayane ninnu srstincadu, taruvata elanti lopam lekunda ninnu tircididdadu mariyu ninnu tagina pramananlo rupondincadu
tanu talacina akaranlo ninnu malicadu
ala kadu! Vastavaniki miru (paraloka) tirpunu abad'dhamani tiraskaristunnaru
mariyu, niscayanga! Mim'malni kanipettukoni undevaru (devadutalu) unnaru
varu, gauravaniyulaina lekhakulu
miru cesedanta telusukunevaru
niscayanga punyatmulu sukhasantosalalo teliyadutu untaru
mariyu niscayanga, dustulu bhagabhaga mande narakagnilo untaru
tirpu dinamuna varu andulo pravesistaru
mariyu varu dani nundi enta matram tappincukoleru
mariyu a tirpudinam ante emito nikela telustundi
avunu mari! A tirpudinam ante emito nikela telustundi
a dinamuna e manavuniki kuda itaruniki elanti sahayam cese adhikaram undadu. Mariyu a roju nirnayadhikaram kevalam allah ke untundi
kolatalalo, tunikalalo tagginci icce variki vinasamundi
varu prajala nundi tisukunetappudu purtiga tisukuntaru
mariyu tamu prajalaku kolici gani leka tuci gani iccetappudu matram tagginci istaru
emi? Ilanti varu tirigi bratikinci lepabadarani bhavistunnara
oka goppa dinamuna
sarva lokala prabhuvu samaksanlo prajalu andaru nilabade roju
ala kadu! Niscayanga, dustula karmapatram sijjinulo undi
a sijjin ante nivu emanukuntunnavu
vrasi pettabadina (ceragani) grantham
satyanni tiraskarince variki a roju vinasamundi
varike! Evaraite tirpudinanni tiraskaristaro
mariyu mitimiri pravartince papisthudu tappa, marevvadu danini (tirpu dinanni) tiraskarincadu
Ma sucanalu (ayat lu) atadiki vinipinca badinappudu atadu: "Ivi purvakalapu kattukathale!" Ani antadu
ala kadu! Vastavaniki vari hrdayalaku vari (dusta) karyala truppu pattindi
antekadu, a roju niscayanga, varu tama prabhuvu karunyam nundi nirodhimpa badataru
taruvata varu niscayanga, bhagabhaga mande narakagniloki potaru
appudu varito: "Deninaite miru asatyamani tiraskaristu vaccaro, adi ide!" Ani ceppabadutundi
ala kadu! Niscayanga, dharmanisthaparula (punyatmula) karmapatram mahonnata grantham (illiyyun)lo undi
mari a illiyyun ante nivu emanukuntunnavu
adi vrasipettabadina oka grantham
daniki, (allah ku) sannihitulaina varu (devadutalu) saksyanga untaru
niscayanga, punyatmulu sukhasantosalalo untaru
ettaina asanalapai kurconi (svargadrsyalanu) tilakistu
vari mukhalu sukhasantosalato kalakalaladutu undatam nivu custavu
silu ceyabadina nanyamaina madhuvu variki tragataniki ivvabadutundi
dani civari cukkalonu kasturi suvasana untundi. Kabatti danini pondataniki apeksince varanta prayasa padali
mariyu danilo (a madhuvulo) tasnim kalupabadi untundi
adoka celama, (allah) sannidhyam pondinavare dani nundi tragutaru
vastavaniki (prapancanlo) aparadhulu visvasincina varini helana cesevaru
mariyu viru (visvasulu), vari (avisvasula) yeduta nundi poyi nappudu, varu (avisvasulu) parasparam kanusaigalu cesukunevaru
mariyu (avisvasulu) tama inti vari daggariki poyinappudu (visvasulanu gurinci) parihasistu maralevaru
mariyu (visvasulanu) cusinapudalla: "Niscayanga, viru dari tappinavaru!" Ani anevaru
Mariyu varu (avisvasulu) viri (visvasula) mida kapaladaruluga pampabadaledu
kani i roju (punarut'thana dinam nadu) visvasincinavaru, satyatiraskarulanu cusi navvutaru
ettaina asanalapai kurconi (svargadrsyalanu) tilakistu (ila antaru)
ika! I satyatiraskarulaku, vari cestalaku tagina pratiphalam tappa maremaina dorukuna
akasam braddalayi poyinappudu
mariyu adi tana prabhuvu adesapalana cesindi mariyu ade dani vidhyukta dharmam
mariyu bhumi vistarimpajeyabadi (cadunuga ceyabadi) nappudu
mariyu adi tana lopala unnadanta bayatiki visarivesi, khali ayinappudu
adi tana prabhuvu adesapalana cesindi mariyu ade dani vidhyukta dharmam
o manavuda! Niscayanga, nivu ni prabhuvu vaipunaku, ni (manci-cedu) karmalanu tisukoni maralutunnavu, oka niscita maralpu. Appudu nivu ni (karmala phalitanni) pondutavu
appudu tana karmapatram kudicetilo ivvabadinavadi nundi
atani lekka ati telikaga tisukobadagaladu
mariyu atadu santosanga tana vari daggaraku maralipotadu
ika tana karmapatram vipu venuka nundi ivvabadinavadu
appudatadu tana nasananne - korukuntadu
mariyu atadu mandutunna narakagnilo padipotadu
vastavaniki, atadu (prapancanlo) tana vari madhya sukhasantosalalo munigi undevadu
vastavaniki, atadu (ma vaipuku) maraliradani bhavincevadu
ala kadu! Vastavaniki, atani prabhuvu atanini gamanistu undevadu
kanuka, nenu sandhyakalapu erupu saksiga cebutunnanu
ratri saksiga, adi progu cesevati saksiga
purnacandruni saksiga
mirandaru tappanisariga oka sthiti nundi maroka sthitiki kramakramanga marutu povalasi untundi
ayite viri kemayindi? Viru enduku visvasincaru
Mariyu khur'an viri mundu pathimpabadinappudu virenduku sastangam (sajda) ceyaru
ala kadu! I satyatiraskarulu dinini asatyamantunnaru
mariyu varu kudabettedanta allah ku baga telusu
kabatti variki (paralokanlo) labhince vyadhabharitamaina siksa yokka vartanivvu
visvasinci satkaryalu cese variki tappa - variki ennatiki antam gani pratiphalam untundi
vistaramaina taraganam gala akasam saksiga
vagdanam ceyabadina (punarut'thana) dinam saksiga
cucedani (dinam) mariyu cudabade dani (dinam) saksiga
agni kandakam (ukhud) varu nasanam ceyabaddaru
indhananto tivranga mande agnini rajesevaru
varu dani (a kandakam) ancupai kurconi unnappudu
mariyu tamu visvasula patla cese ghora karyalanu (sajiva dahanalanu) tilakincevaru
mariyu varu visvasula patla kasi pencukovadaniki karanam - varu (visvasulu) sarvasaktimantudu, sarva stotralaku ar'hudaina - allah nu visvasincadam matrame
ayane! Evarikaite bhumyakasala adhipatyam undo! Mariyu allah ye pratidaniki saksi

evaraite visvasulaina purusulanu mariyu visvasulaina strilanu hinsistaro, a taruvata pascattapanto ksamapana koraro! Niscayanga, alanti variki narakasiksa untundi. Mariyu variki mande narakagni siksa vidhincabadutundi
niscayanga, visvasinci satkaryalu cesevari koraku krinda selayellu pravahince svargavanaluntayi. Ade goppa vijayam
niscayanga, ni prabhuvu yokka pattu (siksa) cala kathinamainadi
niscayanga, ayane (srstini) arambhincevadu mariyu ayane (danini) marala unikiloki teccevadu
mariyu ayana ksamasiludu, amita vatsalyudu
sinhasananni (ars nu) adhistincina vadu, mahattvapurnudu
tanu talacindi ceyagalavadu
Emi? Sain'yala vari samacaram niku andinda
phir'aun mariyu samud vari (sain'yala)
ala kadu, satyatiraskarulu (satyanni) tiraskarincutalo nimagnulai unnaru
mariyu allah varini venuka (prati dikku) nundi cuttumutti unnadu
vastavaniki, idi oka divyamaina khur'an
suraksitamaina phalakam (lauhe mah phuj) lo (vrayabadi) unnadi
akasam mariyu ratrivela vacce naksatram (at tarikh) saksiga
